name: selenium_element_interaction
description: Finding and interacting with web elements using various locators

args: from selenium import webdriver; from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By; driver = webdriver.Chrome(); driver.get('https://example.com'); element = driver.find_element(By.TAG_NAME, 'h1'); print(f'Found: {element.text}'); driver.quit()

expected_output.example:
Found: Example Domain

Element located by TAG_NAME

args: from selenium import webdriver; from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By; driver = webdriver.Chrome(); driver.get('https://google.com'); search_box = driver.find_element(By.NAME, 'q'); search_box.send_keys('Selenium WebDriver'); search_box.submit(); print('Search submitted'); driver.quit()

expected_output.example:
Search submitted

Input field filled and form submitted

args: from selenium import webdriver; from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By; driver = webdriver.Chrome(); driver.get('https://example.com'); links = driver.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, 'a'); print(f'Found {len(links)} links'); for link in links[:3]: print(f'  - {link.text}: {link.get_attribute("href")}'); driver.quit()

expected_output.example:
Found 1 links
  - More information...: https://www.iana.org/domains/example

Multiple elements found and iterated
